sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>forehead</radical> is in the <radical>sun</radical>, and you start seeing those creatures with <radical>lid</radical>s for heads and  <radical>fins</radical> for feet again. Where on earth did they come from? They must have come from the <kanji>underworld</kanji>. Nothing like that exists in this life.
meaningInfo: Imagine the heat of the sun on your forehead as you watch these horrible creatures with lid-heads and fin-feet. There's no doubt that these are creatures from the underworld. You get out of the sun as fast as you can.
readingMnemonic: The sun is unusually hot for the month of <reading>May</reading> (<ja>めい</ja>), which must be why those underworld creatures are running around.
readingInfo: You make a mental note to always avoid the sun in May.
